Sentencas: Mixed Mn-Co spinels are currently studied as protective coating materials for Solid Oxide Fuel Cells interconnects.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: Compositional changes in manganese cobaltites lead to modifications in the materials properties, such as sintering behaviour, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity, with advantages in the technological application.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: In this work, the effect of Fe, Cu and simultaneous Fe+Cu doping of Mn-Co spinels has been studied.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: Different oxide powder mixtures were prepared with a High Energy Ball Milling (HEBM) treatment, obtaining highly reactive oxides that easily form single spinel phase compounds by moderate heating.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: The effect of the composition is observed on high temperature stability of the spinel phase and on densification behaviour of the powders, greatly enhanced by copper addition.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: Analyses carried out on sintered pellets allow to observe simple relations among dopant concentration, thermal expansion and electrical conductivity.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: The combined effect is obtained in case of the simultaneous addition of multiple dopants.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels

Sentencas: An appropriate composition can be therefore designed to obtain a material characterized by enhanced sintering behaviour, high electrical conductivity and tailored thermal expansion to fulfil the application requirements.
Titulo: The effect of chemical composition on high temperature behaviour of Fe and Cu doped Mn-Co spinels
